mapper.select: select paydate, sum(if(payselect='수입',amount,0)) as deposit, sum(if(payselect='지출',amount,0)) as withdraw from accountbook group by paydate order by paydate asc
select * from accountbook order by paydate
select * from accountbook where payselect='수입' order by paydate
select * from accountbook where payselect='지출' order by paydate
mapper.update: update accountbook set paydate = #{paydate}, payselect= #{payselect}, category = #{category}, amount = #{amount}, memo = #{memo} where id = #{id}
